page.title: 03A DAY AT WORK
page.content: 0500 Alarm rings,get up, breakfast. 0525 Set off to work on cycle. 0550 Arrive at quarry,change clothes. 0600 Start work which may be driving a heavy dump truck,caterpillar shovels or operating crushing plant. l000 Meal break. l030 Resume work. 1400 Finish work. 1430 Arrive home. The roadstone plant takes stone of all sizes,reduces it by crushers & screens to between 50mm and 3mm.The resulting stone is moved to stockpiles in the quarry by dump truck for future use. Caterpillar shovels are used to load the stone onto road wagons as required. l5th June l985.
